category.name: account
category.desc: The "account" category is to be used by a server when responding to a disco request sent to the bare JID (user@host addresss) of an account hosted by the server.

type.name: admin
type.desc: The user@host is an administrative account

type.name: anonymous
type.desc: The user@host is a "guest" account that allows anonymous login by any user

type.name: registered
type.desc: The user@host is a registered or provisioned account associated with a particular non-administrative user

category.name: auth
category.desc: The "auth" category consists of server components that provide authentication services within a server implementation.

type.name: cert
type.desc: A server component that authenticates based on external certificates

type.name: generic
type.desc: A server authentication component other than one of the registered types

type.name: ldap
type.desc: A server component that authenticates against an LDAP database

type.name: ntlm
type.desc: A server component that authenticates against an NT domain

type.name: pam
type.desc: A server component that authenticates against a PAM system

type.name: radius
type.desc: A server component that authenticates against a Radius system

category.name: automation
category.desc: The "automation" category consists of entities and nodes that provide automated or programmed interaction.

type.name: command-list
type.desc: The node for a list of commands; valid only for the node "http://jabber.org/protocol/commands"

type.name: command-node
type.desc: A node for a specific command; the "node" attribute uniquely identifies the command

type.name: rpc
type.desc: An entity that supports Jabber-RPC.

type.name: soap
type.desc: An entity that supports the SOAP XMPP Binding.

type.name: translation
type.desc: An entity that provides automated translation services.

category.name: client
category.desc: The "client" category consists of different types of clients, mostly for instant messaging.

type.name: bot
type.desc: An automated client that is not controlled by a human user

type.name: console
type.desc: Minimal non-GUI client used on dumb terminals or text-only screens

type.name: handheld
type.desc: A client running on a PDA, RIM device, or other handheld

type.name: pc
type.desc: Standard full-GUI client used on desktops and laptops

type.name: phone
type.desc: A client running on a mobile phone or other telephony device

type.name: web
type.desc: A client operated from within a web browser

category.name: collaboration
category.desc: The "collaboration" category consists of services that enable multiple individuals to work together in real time.

type.name: whiteboard
type.desc: Multi-user whiteboarding service

category.name: component
category.desc: The "component" category consists of services that are internal to server implementations and not normally exposed outside a server.

type.name: archive
type.desc: A server component that archives traffic

type.name: c2s
type.desc: A server component that handles client connections

type.name: generic
type.desc: A server component other than one of the registered types

type.name: load
type.desc: A server component that handles load balancing

type.name: log
type.desc: A server component that logs server information

type.name: presence
type.desc: A server component that provides presence information

type.name: router
type.desc: A server component that handles core routing logic

type.name: s2s
type.desc: A server component that handles server connections

type.name: sm
type.desc: A server component that manages user sessions

type.name: stats
type.desc: A server component that provides server statistics

category.name: conference
category.desc: The "conference" category consists of online conference services such as multi-user chatroom services.

type.name: irc
type.desc: Internet Relay Chat service

type.name: text
type.desc: Text conferencing service

category.name: directory
category.desc: The "directory" category consists of information retrieval services that enable users to search online directories or otherwise be informed about the existence of other XMPP entities.

type.name: chatroom
type.desc: A directory of chatrooms

type.name: group
type.desc: A directory that provides shared roster groups

type.name: user
type.desc: A directory of end users (e.g., JUD)

type.name: waitinglist
type.desc: A directory of waiting list entries

category.name: gateway
category.desc: The "gateway" category consists of translators between Jabber/XMPP services and non-XMPP services.

type.name: aim
type.desc: Gateway to AOL Instant Messenger

type.name: facebook
type.desc: Gateway to the Facebook IM service

type.name: gadu-gadu
type.desc: Gateway to the Gadu-Gadu IM service

type.name: http-ws
type.desc: Gateway that provides HTTP Web Services access

type.name: icq
type.desc: Gateway to ICQ

type.name: irc
type.desc: Gateway to IRC

type.name: lcs
type.desc: Gateway to Microsoft Live Communications Server

type.name: mrim
type.desc: Gateway to the mail.ru IM service

type.name: msn
type.desc: Gateway to MSN Messenger

type.name: myspaceim
type.desc: Gateway to the MySpace IM service

type.name: ocs
type.desc: Gateway to Microsoft Office Communications Server

type.name: qq
type.desc: Gateway to the QQ IM service

type.name: sametime
type.desc: Gateway to IBM Lotus Sametime

type.name: simple
type.desc: Gateway to SIP for Instant Messaging and Presence Leveraging Extensions (SIMPLE)

type.name: skype
type.desc: Gateway to the Skype service

type.name: sms
type.desc: Gateway to Short Message Service

type.name: smtp
type.desc: Gateway to the SMTP (email) network

type.name: tlen
type.desc: Gateway to the Tlen IM service

type.name: xfire
type.desc: Gateway to the Xfire gaming and IM service

type.name: xmpp
type.desc: Gateway to another XMPP service (NOT via native server-to-server communication)

type.name: yahoo
type.desc: Gateway to Yahoo! Instant Messenger

category.name: headline
category.desc: The "headline" category consists of services that provide real-time news or information (often but not necessarily in a message of type "headline").

type.name: newmail
type.desc: Service that notifies a user of new email messages.

type.name: rss
type.desc: RSS notification service.

type.name: weather
type.desc: Service that provides weather alerts.

category.name: hierarchy
category.desc: The "hierarchy" category is used to describe nodes within a hierarchy of nodes; the "branch" and "leaf" types are exhaustive.

type.name: branch
type.desc: A service discovery node that contains further nodes in the hierarchy.

type.name: leaf
type.desc: A service discovery node that does not contain further nodes in the hierarchy.

category.name: proxy
category.desc: The "proxy" category consists of servers or services that act as special-purpose proxies or intermediaries between two or more XMPP endpoints.

type.name: bytestreams
type.desc: SOCKS5 bytestreams proxy service

category.name: pubsub
category.desc: Services and nodes that adhere to XEP-0060.

type.name: collection
type.desc: A pubsub node of the "collection" type.

type.name: leaf
type.desc: A pubsub node of the "leaf" type.

type.name: pep
type.desc: A personal eventing service that supports the publish-subscribe subset defined in XEP-0163.

type.name: service
type.desc: A pubsub service that supports the functionality defined in XEP-0060.

category.name: server
category.desc: The "server" category consists of any Jabber/XMPP server.

type.name: im
type.desc: Standard Jabber/XMPP server used for instant messaging and presence

category.name: store
category.desc: The "store" category consists of internal server components that provide data storage and retrieval services.

type.name: berkeley
type.desc: A server component that stores data in a Berkeley database

type.name: file
type.desc: A server component that stores data on the file system

type.name: generic
type.desc: A server data storage component other than one of the registered types

type.name: ldap
type.desc: A server component that stores data in an LDAP database

type.name: mysql
type.desc: A server component that stores data in a MySQL database

type.name: oracle
type.desc: A server component that stores data in an Oracle database

type.name: postgres
type.desc: A server component that stores data in a PostgreSQL database
